oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of William Carroll Smith and wife Mary C. Reynolds
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of William Carroll Smith, Batty. A, 1st Ky. Light Arty., USA and Mary C. (Reynolds) Smith. He was born March 8, 1820 in Overton County, Tenn. and died July 1910. He was the son of George W. Smith, Jr. and Martha C. Reynolds.; He enlisted December 21, 1861 at Camp Boyle, Ky. He was discharged due to chronic rhumatism July 14, 1865 in Jeffersonville, Iowa. His wife apparently move to Albany, Ky. during the war. He is shown wearing a Grand Army of the Republic medal in the photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Smith, William Carroll ;Reynolds, Mary C.
